Module com.fy916.bubblebobble

Package com.fy916.bubblebobble.gaming.elements.movingelements

package com.fy916.bubblebobble.gaming.elements.movingelements
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    Bubble
    The Bubble class handles everything with the Hero's special ability, named the bubble.
    It extends MovingObject.
    It begins at the Hero, and grows covering the whole screen.
    Enemy
    An Enemy is a non-controllable element which kills the Hero whenever it or its projectile comes in contact.
    It extends MovingObject.
    Enemies are able to be bubbled and free themselves from these bubbles after a period of time.
    Fruit
    The Fruit class handles how the fruit is created and interacts with the Hero.
    It extends MovingObject.
    The fruits are created after a bubble containing an Enemy is popped.
    Hero
    A Hero is an element that is controllable by the player.
    It extends MovingObject.
    Hero can shoot Projectile, shield from attacks, trigger a special attack and collect Fruit for points.
    MovingObject
    An abstract class which is extended from the GameObject, this is intended for the objects that will be moving around within the game world (unlinke MapObject).
    This class contains some ability that the moving objects will have like velocity, acceleration, direction, Die, Jump, these properties shows the Stragety Design pattern.
    Projectile
    The Projectile class handles the projectiles being shot from a Hero or an Enemy.
    It extends MovingObject.
    The type of the projectile determines whether a Hero or an Enemy will be hurt, along with different property.
    ScoreIndicator
    A ScoreIndicator is the indicator that appears when a Fruit is picked by the hero showing the score this fruit provides.
    It extends MovingObject.
